name: graphscript-core
description: Comprehensive acyclic-graph based application architecture with microservices and networking.

scripts.dev: npm run pip && npm i --save-dev concurrently && npm i --save-dev nodemon && npm run concurrent
scripts.pip: pip install quart && pip install websockets
scripts.pwa: npm i workbox-cli && workbox generateSW node_server/pwa/workbox-config.js && npm run build && npm start

author: Joshua Brewster
